I am a third-year Ph.D. student in Statistical Data Analysis at [Ghent University](https://www.ugent.be/en){style="text-decoration: none"} under the supervision of Prof. Dr. [Stijn Vansteelandt](https://users.ugent.be/~svsteela/){style="text-decoration: none"} (Ghent University) and Prof. Dr. [Christophe Ley](https://math.uni.lu/midas/people/dp/?christopheley){style="text-decoration: none"} (University of Luxembourg). My research lies at the intersection of causal inference and debiased machine learning. If you want to get in touch, please don't hesitate to contact me.

## **Education**

-   Ph.D. in Statistical Data Analysis, Ghent University, Belgium\
    Aug 2022 - Aug 2028 (expected)

-   MSc in Mathematics, Ghent University, Belgium\
